what: An R package of various functions build by p0bs
title: An R package of various functions build by p0bs
text: Assorted functions observations p0bs, including: liability_tax: Estimating Income Tax & National Insurance liabilities UK resident probability_ruin: Calculating probability retirement spend rate sustainable rate_annuity: Getting latest annuity rates UK

what: Calculate UK income and/or National Insurance taxes — liability_tax
title: Calculate UK income and/or National Insurance taxes — liability_tax
text: function applies prevailing tax bands rates give simple calculation UK Income Tax National Insurance (nearest couple pounds). Please note approximations, rely financial returns planning. output list, containing following measures: `income_net` net income (Income Tax National Insurance); `income_tax` Income Tax liability; `ni` National Insurance liability; `total_tax` combined Income Tax National Insurance liability.

title: Calculate UK income and/or National Insurance taxes — liability_tax
Calculate UK income and/or National Insurance taxes — liability_tax
text: income_taxable taxable income level (.e. deductions things like pension contributions). tax_year_end calendar year tax year ends, YYYY integer. example, tax year 2023/24 2024.

title: Calculate UK income and/or National Insurance taxes — liability_tax

what: p0bservations: Assorted Functions and Observations by P0bs — p0bservations-package
title: p0bservations: Assorted Functions and Observations by P0bs — p0bservations-package
text: Provides assorted functions p0bs.

title: p0bservations: Assorted Functions and Observations by P0bs — p0bservations-package
text: Maintainer: Robin Penfold robinpenfold@icloud.com

what: Calculate the probability of retirement ruin — probability_ruin
title: Calculate the probability of retirement ruin — probability_ruin
text: function uses Milevsky-Robinson analyse probability retirement ruin, parsimoniously meshing investment risk return, mortality estimates spending rates without resorting opaque Monte Carlo simulations. details, see: Milevsky, M. C. Robinson; "Sustainable Spending Rate without Simulation"; Financial Analysts Journal, Volume 61, Number 6. (2005). Please note approximations, rely financial returns planning.

title: Calculate the probability of retirement ruin — probability_ruin
Calculate the probability of retirement ruin — probability_ruin
text: return_expected expected real return entire pension portfolio return_sd projected standard deviation returns entire pension portfolio life_remaining_expected median projected remaining lifespan individual question rate_spend annual spending rate applied individual pension portfolio

title: Calculate the probability of retirement ruin — probability_ruin

what: Calculate the spend rate for a given probability of retirement ruin — probability_ruin_rate
title: Calculate the spend rate for a given probability of retirement ruin — probability_ruin_rate
text: function uses Milevsky-Robinson analyse spend rate given probability retirement ruin, parsimoniously meshing investment risk return, mortality estimates spending rates without resorting opaque Monte Carlo simulations. details, see: Milevsky, M. C. Robinson; "Sustainable Spending Rate without Simulation"; Financial Analysts Journal, Volume 61, Number 6. (2005). Please note approximations, rely financial returns planning.

title: Calculate the spend rate for a given probability of retirement ruin — probability_ruin_rate
Calculate the spend rate for a given probability of retirement ruin — probability_ruin_rate
text: return_expected expected real return entire pension portfolio return_sd projected standard deviation returns entire pension portfolio life_remaining_expected median projected remaining lifespan individual question value_probability_ruin desired probability retirement ruin (used solve corresponding spend rate)

title: Calculate the spend rate for a given probability of retirement ruin — probability_ruin_rate

what: Get the latest annuity rates for the UK — rate_annuity
title: Get the latest annuity rates for the UK — rate_annuity
text: function retrieves data UK annuity rates Sharing Pensions. Rates available different specifications ages. See website details. Please note approximations, rely financial returns planning.

title: Get the latest annuity rates for the UK — rate_annuity
Get the latest annuity rates for the UK — rate_annuity
text: <https://www.sharingpensions.co.uk/annuity_rates.htm>

title: Get the latest annuity rates for the UK — rate_annuity
text: value_age choices age annuitant, namely: `55`, `60`, `65`, `70` `75`. ensuing annuity rates imply annuity begins paid immediately thereafter monthly basis. value_specifications specifications available, varying : whether annuity single basis joint basis (, , whether last remaining spouse receives half annuity); whether annuity guaranteed ten years ; whether payments escalate 3 single_simple single, level rate, guarantee single_guaranteed single, level rate, guaranteed single_escalating single, escalating rate, guarantee half_simple joint, half upon first death, level rate, guarantee full_simple joint, upon first death, level rate, guarantee half_escalating joint, half upon first death, escalating rate, guarantee

title: Get the latest annuity rates for the UK — rate_annuity

what: Key income tax parameters for the UK. — tax_parameters
title: Key income tax parameters for the UK. — tax_parameters
text: dataset containing main tax parameters used calculating net income UK (outside Scotland).

title: Key income tax parameters for the UK. — tax_parameters
Key income tax parameters for the UK. — tax_parameters
text: data frame 3 rows (one tax year) 14 variables: year_tax_end calendar year end tax year occurs level_ni_lower lower level breakpoint National Insurance level_ni_upper upper level breakpoint National Insurance level_allowance_lower lower level breakpoint personal allowance level_allowance_upper upper level breakpoint personal allowance level_tax_higher income breakpoint higher rate income tax level_tax_upper income breakpoint upper rate income tax rate_ni_lower lower level tax rate National Insurance rate_ni_upper upper level tax rate National Insurance rate_allowance_drop rate personal allowance drops `level_allowance_upper` rate_tax_basic basic rate income tax rate_tax_higher higher rate income tax rate_tax_upper upper rate income tax rate_tax_sales rate sales tax, also called VAT

title: Key income tax parameters for the UK. — tax_parameters
text: https://www.crunch.co.uk/knowledge-tax/tax-rates-thresholds--allowances--current-tax-year/
